stories.text:
You have an idea, started building already or perhaps you have a prototype or an MVP. How do companies get their first 10,20,50,100 customers?

This is the valley of deaths where most of the nascent companies die. There are a lot of great stories and anecdotes created post-factum to entertain but they do provide little applicability and value. Any thoughts on this ?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do startups get their first customers?

stories.text: I am very interested in how people learn STEM, and would love to know about your experience, and how you felt about learning using paper-based books/pen/pencil (analogue, if you will) vs using digital books and resources.
stories.title: Did you learn STEM with paper books or digital ones?
